post.text: This is Crooked Hillary at her finest! Our future Vice President Mike Pence speaks the TRUTH about the shady Clinton Foundation!

comment.author: Jessica
comment.text: I didn't know who Pence was when he was announced as Trump's running mate. But the more I hear the man speak and see the man on the campaign trail the more I realize just how great this party/ticket is. #trump2016

replies.author: Carly
replies.text: Pence was at a rally in the rain.... Stood out in the rain to talk to people. That's my kind of leadership.

replies.author: Margo
replies.text: Mike Pence is a very good honorable man!!

replies.author: Briana
replies.text: I remember seeing Mike Pence when Obama was running and him talking about Obamacare etc. He has always been at the top for me and was delighted when he was chosen as VP nominee. I have heard your comment from quite a few people. Mike Pence was a great choice. I am praying we get the chance to see him in the WH.
